EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Testing On Cloud 9 with TaaS - 2015.04.22.Email - Follow Up - Attendee
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for attending our Testing on Cloud 9 with Tosca as a Service webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: Testing On Cloud 9 with Tosca as a Service (TaaS)
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Thank you for attending our webinar, Testing on Cloud 9 with Tosca as a Service! We hope you found the webinar informative and helpful. Your active participation and engaging questions made the difference.
Click here for a recording of this webinar, or visit our Resource page <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/> for more presentations.
If you would like to stay up to date, please follow us on Twitter @Tricentis <https://twitter.com/Tricentis>. For any additional questions, please feel free to follow and tweet our Support Team @TricentisSpprt <https://twitter.com/TricentisSpprt>.
Thanks, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Michael Niessl TaaS Product Owner Tricentis
